name: MAIN
code:
SET EXTENDED CHECK.
BREAK-POINT.
BREAK-POINT ID MYID.
break-point.
WRITE 'Hello World'.
DATA lv_ok TYPE i.
IF lv_ok = 1.
  WRITE 'OK'.
ENDIF.
DATA lv_test TYPE string. BREAK-POINT. lv_test = 'X'.
SeT   ExTeNdEd    CheCK .
SET EXTENDED MODE.
BREAK ME.
BREAKING NEWS.
BREAK-POINT. BREAK-POINT ID xyz.
